name: Mob simulator (a Fangame of Pet Simulator)
name_original: Mob simulator (a Fangame of Pet Simulator)
description:
the reason i named it Mob simulator so i can avoid copyrighting which other people should do too.

Controls:

use arrow keys to move or asdw to move.

click the coins to collect

stuck? press n to tp up and m to tp down

try getting all the pets!

good luck :)

thanks to @salaheddienben for some of the art work and thanks to @NoobG4mesDev for the Pets original costumes go check it out!

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/590860233/

also try the real game if you haven't! https://www.roblox.com/games/6284583030/Axolotls-Pet-Simulator-X
